name: GSM8K Math Problem Solving Rubric
description: Evaluation criteria for mathematical problem-solving with calculator tool usage

criteria.description: The reasoning steps are clear, logical, and easy to follow with explicit intermediate thoughts
criteria.expected_pattern: Step-by-step breakdown showing work, intermediate calculations visible

criteria.description: The calculator tool is used appropriately for ALL arithmetic operations, no mental math
criteria.expected_pattern: Tool calls present for calculations with correct arguments, no manual computation

criteria.description: The final answer is explicitly stated in the required format and easy to identify
